full_summary:
=====================

### Technical Requirements for Bioelectrical Services at Bedford Institute of Oceanography

#### Solicitation Number
WS4354791793

#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites eligible contractors to participate in an open bidding process for the provision of Electrical Engineering services at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

#### Contract Overview
This Request for Standing Offer is for a five-year period, commencing on April 1, 2024, and ending on March 31, 2029. The contracting entity is expecting to award a single contract for Electrical Engineering services.

#### Notice Details
Respondents will be required to submit their proposal electronically through the Ariba Discovery system by February 12, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time. The Government has the right to award the contract to any Respondent whose proposal meets the specified requirements.

### Request Details
* The contractor shall provide Electrical Engineering services.
* The Services are: 72151500 - Electrical system services.

### Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price, with the evaluation focused on the cost of goods and services.

### Trade Agreements
This contract is open to all eligible vendors who meet the requirements and have participated in the contracting process.

### Region of Opportunity
* The contract is open to Response from bidders throughout Canada, but service delivery will be required in the province of Nova Scotia.

### Procurement Method
The contract will be awarded on the basis of open bidding.

### Special Considerations for The Award
Please refer to the Request for Proposals documentation or contact the contracting officer regarding any special requirements or concerns.

**Information for Contact**

Contracting Officer’s Information:
Kate Mintzer (elle-la / she-her)
kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Document with Additional Description and Other Related Information**

You can find more information at the Discovery URL https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18555327?extsite=MTg1NTUzMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Documents or Attachments**

 None

### Important Dates

* The deadline for submission of the Tender Proposal is on February 12, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time. The submitted documents will only be considered valid after verifying.
* Selling to the Government of Canada
